languages.text: {n}Кибелла улыбается уголком рта.{/n} "Неужели? Разве не этого ожидают в твоем окружении? Игра недомолвок, случайных взглядов, двусмысленных улыбок, невысказанных обещаний... Если ты с{mf|чел|очла} мои слова и жесты преисполненными истины — напрасно. Я здесь с тобой. И только с тобой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла улыбается уголком рта.{/n} "Неужели? Разве не этого ожидают в твоем окружении? Игра недомолвок, случайных взглядов, двусмысленных улыбок, невысказанных обещаний... если ты с{mf|сел|очла} мои слова и жесты преисполненными истины — напрасно. Я здесь с тобой. И только с тобой".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла улыбается уголком рта.{/n} "Неужели? Разве не этого ожидают в твоем окружении? Игра недомолвок, случайных взглядов, двусмысленных улыбок, невысказанных обещаний... Если ты с{mf|чел|очла} мои слова и жесты преисполненными истины — напрасно. Я здесь с тобой. И только с тобой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in? A game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises... If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you. No one else."

A game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises... If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you. No one else."

I am here with you and you alone."

Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

languages.text: {n}Ein zartes Lächeln spielt um Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Ach ja? Spielen Leute Eures Standes denn nicht genau dieses Spiel? Andeutungen, beiläufige Blicke, ein geheimnisvolle Lächeln, unausgesprochene Versprechen? Wenn Ihr meine Worte und Gesten als wahr gedeutet habt, so habt Ihr Euch getäuscht. Ich bin hier mit Euch und Euch allein."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein zartes Lächeln spielt um Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Ach ja? Spielen Leute Eures Standes denn nicht genau dieses Spiel? Andeutungen, beiläufige Blicke, ein geheimnisvolle Lächeln, unausgesprochene Versprechen? Wenn Ihr meine Worte und Gesten als wahr gedeutet habt, so habt Ihr Euch getäuscht. Ich bin hier mit Euch und Euch allein."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sonríe solo con la comisura de sus labios.{/n} «¿Sí? ¿No es eso con lo que se entretiene la gente de su estatura, un juego de insinuaciones, miradas casuales, sonrisas ambiguas y promesas implícitas? Si lee mis palabras y gestos como sinceros, se equivoca. Solo he venido aquí por usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sonríe solo con la comisura de sus labios.{/n} «¿Sí? ¿No es eso con lo que se entretiene la gente de su estatura, un juego de insinuaciones, miradas casuales, sonrisas ambiguas y promesas implícitas? Si lee mis palabras y gestos como sinceros, se equivoca. Solo he venido aquí por usted».

languages.text: {n}キベラは口の端だけで笑う。{/n}「そうだった？あなたのような立場の人たちがすることじゃない。当てこすり、ちょっとした目くばせ、あいまいな微笑み、暗黙の約束のゲームでしょ？私の言葉や身振りを本心だと受け取ったのなら、それは大きな間違いよ。私はここに、あなただけと一緒にいるの」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは口の端だけで笑う。{/n}「そうだった？あなたのような立場の人たちがすることじゃない。当てこすり、ちょっとした目くばせ、あいまいな微笑み、暗黙の約束のゲームでしょ？私の言葉や身振りを本心だと受け取ったのなら、それは大きな間違いよ。私はここに、あなただけと一緒にいるの」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈嘴角露出了一丝笑意。{/n}“是这样吗？你们这种地位的人，不是经常会玩这种暗送秋波的把戏吗？不经意的一瞥，暧昧的微笑，未说出口的承诺，是这样吧？如果你把我刚刚的话语和手势当了真，那你就错了。我与你同在，我身边只有你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈嘴角露出了一丝笑意。{/n}“是这样吗？你们这种地位的人，不是经常会玩这种暗送秋波的把戏吗？不经意的一瞥，暧昧的微笑，未说出口的承诺，是这样吧？如果你把我刚刚的话语和手势当了真，那你就错了。我与你同在，我身边只有你。”

languages.text: « Vraiment ? {n}dit Kibellah avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Insinuations, regards désinvoltes, sourires ambigus et promesses tacites... n'est-ce pas ce à quoi s'adonnent les gens de votre statut ? Si vous avez considéré mes paroles et mes gestes comme véridiques, alors vous vous êtes lourdement {mf|fourvoyé|fourvoyée}. Je suis ici avec vous, et avec {mf|nul|nulle} autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? {n}dit Kibellah avec un sourire en coin.{/n} Insinuations, regards désinvoltes, sourires ambigus et promesses tacites... n'est-ce pas ce à quoi s'adonnent les gens de votre statut ? Si vous avez considéré mes paroles et mes gestes comme véridiques, alors vous vous êtes lourdement {mf|fourvoyé|fourvoyée}. Je suis ici avec vous, et avec {mf|nul|nulle} autre. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın dudağının kenarında hafif bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Öyle miymiş? Senin mevkindeki insanların uğraşları bunlar değil mi? Üstü kapalı sözlerle, kaçamak bakışlarla, müphem gülümsemelerle ve dile getirilmeyen sözlerle dolu oyunlar oynamıyorlar mı? Sözlerimle hareketlerimi hakikat olarak algıladıysan hatalısın. Burada benim için yalnızca sen varsın."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah smiles with just the corner of her mouth.{/n} "Did it, now? Is that not what people of your standing engage in — a game of insinuation, casual glances, ambiguous smiles, unspoken promises? If you read my words and gestures as truthful, you were mistaken. I am here with you and you alone."
